children.name: evolve-f37
children.question: Can the entropy detector predict system health trends? Track entropy count across 10 sessions.
children.task:
Research: Can the entropy detector predict system health trends? Track entropy count across 10 sessions.
Investigate this question through analysis, web search if needed, and reasoning. Write your findings as a workspace document. Conclude with a clear answer or a refined version of the question.

children.name: evolve-f39
children.question: Does K/N change meaningfully when using finer-grained components (classes/functions instead of modules)? (from child:complexity-test)
children.task:
Investigate: Does K/N change meaningfully when using finer-grained components (classes/functions instead of modules)? (from child:complexity-test)
Apply NK landscape analysis. Count N components, map K dependencies, calculate K/N. Write your findings as a workspace analysis document. Compare with known benchmarks: json (K/N=0.16), http.client (K/N=0.215 core), email (K/N=0.06).
